backend/main.mo: Defines the actor with storage mixin and types for users, avatars, tasks, audit logs, and comparison utilities.
backend/migration.mo: Contains a no-op migration function returning an empty new state.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries mapping features to impacted frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides human-written summaries for various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme CSS defining light and dark OKLCH color variables and global styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading the React app and including a rebuild trigger comment.
frontend/public/rebuild-trigger.txt: Plain text file containing the rebuild timestamp and build version.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component handling authentication, profile fetch logic, and routing to login, setup, or dashboards.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that displays a fallback UI and reload button on unhandled errors.
frontend/src/components/AssistantDetailV: Assistant detail view showing overtime data, task habits, CSV export, and profile info with manager controls.
frontend/src/components/AssistantList.ts: Displays a scrollable list of assistants with avatars and overtime totals, allowing selection and handling loading states.
frontend/src/components/DangerZone.tsx: Provides UI to confirm and execute a full data wipe, clearing storage, cache, and logging the user out.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the app header with theme toggle, user avatar/profile controls, and logout functionality.
frontend/src/components/ManagerAnalytics: Aggregates and visualizes assistants' overtime totals with summary rows and bar charts, handling loading per assistant.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeChart.ts: Generates a cumulative overtime chart (line or bar) from entries, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/OvertimeForm.tsx: Form for adding or using overtime with validation, date handling, and success/error feedback.
Displays searchable, paginated overtime entries and allows editing only the latest entry with validation and mutation support.
Shows a card summarizing total overtime in days, hours, and minutes with loading skeletons.
frontend/src/components/profile/AvatarMo: Provides an avatar selection modal supporting profile picture upload, validation, preset selection, and profile saving.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Displays a user avatar prioritizing uploaded images, preset avatars, or initials with dynamic sizing.
frontend/src/components/ProfileDialog.ts: Renders a user profile dialog with avatar, role, and editable initials saved through profile mutations.
frontend/src/components/todo/AuditLogVie: Shows a searchable, filterable audit log of task actions with formatted timestamps and error handling.
frontend/src/components/todo/EvidenceIma: Displays a dialog to preview an evidence image for a task with a close button.
frontend/src/components/todo/MarkTaskDon: Dialog for marking a task complete with optional comment and photo upload, handling submission and form reset.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskComplet: Displays the user who completed a task using profile data or fallback username with optional avatar.
Handles selecting, capturing, previewing, validating, and removing a photo for task completion evidence.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskLedgerD: Shows a task’s audit history with timestamps, user info, action badges, and optional evidence photo preview.
frontend/src/components/todo/TaskPrefere: Admin UI for viewing and updating assistants’ task preferences, including preferred, neutral, and hated states.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoSection: Main to‑do section managing task CRUD, completion, pinning, searching, dialog state, and periodic refresh.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTable.t: Renders a task table with frequency coloring, action buttons, image previews, and task history dialogs.
frontend/src/components/todo/ToDoTaskDia: Modal dialog for creating or editing a task with validation and optional delete confirmation.
frontend/src/constants/dentalPresets.ts: Defines 24 static dental-themed avatar presets and a helper to fetch preset info by ID.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity, and auth-client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for user profiles, avatars, tasks, and related backend actions using the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Manages light/dark/system theme selection with persistence and system preference syncing.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and extensive CSS variables for a themed light/dark UI, including colors for UI, charts, tasks, and overtime.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AssistantDashboard.ts: Renders the assistant dashboard with tabs for to‑do tasks and overtime logging, summaries, charts, and history.
frontend/src/pages/LoginPage.tsx: Provides the login screen using Internet Identity with branding, status handling, and UI components.
frontend/src/pages/ManagerDashboard.tsx: Displays manager tools including team management, analytics, audit logs, to‑dos, and settings with assistant deletion support.
frontend/src/pages/ProfileSetupPage.tsx: Handles new‑user profile creation with username, initials, language, validation, and submission to the backend.
frontend/src/utils/externalBlobUrl.ts: Creates a URL for external blobs, preferring direct URLs and falling back to object URLs from bytes.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeDates.ts: Provides date utilities for formatting, getting today’s local date, and checking for future dates.
frontend/src/utils/overtimeStyles.ts: Returns CSS class names for overtime cells based on add vs. use entries.
frontend/src/utils/photoValidation.ts: Validates uploaded images for type and size limits (JPEG/PNG, max 6MB).
frontend/src/utils/presetTileColors.ts: Provides deterministic accent colors for avatar preset tiles by mapping preset IDs to a fixed OKLCH color palette.
frontend/src/utils/taskHabits.ts: Computes on‑time task metrics, formats completion history, and provides display labels and colors for task preferences.
frontend/src/utils/todoDates.ts: Generates due dates and urgency scores for tasks based on frequency and workday rules, and formats due‑date text.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session parameters, supporting both query and hash routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, radii, shadows, animations, and loading plugins for the frontend theme.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current issues, features, and pending requests related to fixing the user profile setup flow.
